D1.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AND A1.PYM_ACNT_ID = #{billingAdjust.pymAcntId} /* INPUT */ AND A2.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' AND A2.CTRT_STAT NOT IN ('10', '99', '50', '90') AND B1.SVC_STS_CD NOT IN ('10', , TCMCT_CTRT_INFO A2 /* 계약정보 */ , TCMCU_CUST_INFO A3 /* 고객정보 */ , TCMCT_SVC_CMPS_INFO B1 /* 서비스구성정보 */ , TCMCT_PROD_CMPS_INFO C1 /* 상품구성정보 */ , TPMPD_RATE_ITM D1 , TPMPD_SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP E1 /* 서비스과금항목유형 */ , TPMPD_RATE F1 , TBLIV_EXRATE_INFO G1 WHERE A1.PYM_ACNT_ID = A2.PYM_ACNT_ID /* 납부계정ID */ AND A2.CUST_ID = A3.CUST_ID /* 고객ID */ AND A1.SO_ID = A2.SO_ID AND A1.SO_ID = A3.SO_ID AND A2.SO_ID = B1.SO_ID AND A2.CTRT_ID = B1.CTRT_ID AND B1.SO_ID = C1.SO_ID AND B1.CTRT_ID = C1.CTRT_ID AND B1.PROD_CMPS_ID = C1.PROD_CMPS_ID AND A2.PROD_CMPS_ID = C1.PROD_CMPS_ID /* 기본상품만(무조건 한건) */ AND Y.ADJ_NO
AND X.ADJ_NO = '0000000000'

AND X.ADJ_PT = #{billingAdjust.adjPt} /* 조정시점(BLIV015, 1:청구전,2:청구후) */ ) B ON A.PROD_CMPS_ID = B.PROD_CMPS_ID AND A.SVC_CMPS_ID = B.SVC_CMPS_ID AND A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B.CHRG_ITM_CD WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY SO_NM, A.CUST_NM, A.CTRT_ID, PROD_NM, SVC_NM, A.ATTR_VAL, A.DISP_PRI_NO
